title: Maths English Science [9-14yrs Learning CD]
description:
KEY STAGE 3 ACTION SATS TRIPLE PACK.

Maths English Science Learning CD. 

Tests ability and shows if targets are being achieved
Improves weak areas
Easy-to-use
High score tables for every level maintain motivation
Earn extra time and points with exciting, varied bonus games
Extensive reference section
Music, speech and animation
Built-in help
Prints certificates
Ages 10-14


Installation

Mount Image to Virtual Drive, or Burn to Disk. 


System Requirements 

Windows 95, 98, ME, 2000, XP.
PII 300MHz (or equivalent), 32 Mb RAM, 8Mb Graphics.
60Mb hard drive space.
